docs.snippet: A van crashed into people drinking outside a popular bar Saturday in the German city of Muenster, killing two people and injuring 20 others before the driver of the vehicle shot and killed himself inside it, police said.

headline.main: Germany Seeks Motive After Van Crashes Into Crowd, Killing 2
